original_text: “Flee from the midst of Babylon, and go out of the land of the Chaldeans, and be as male goats before the flock.
korean_text: 너희는 바벨론 가운데에서 도망하라 갈대아 사람의 땅에서 나오라 양 떼에 앞서가는 숫염소 같이 하라

sentences.original_text: Flee from the midst of Babylon
go out of the land of the Chaldeans
be as male goats before the flock
